title: India Offers EU Auto Quota Six Times Larger Than UK Deal
desc: India has agreed to give European automakers a quota more than six times larger than any it has offered before, slashing tariffs under a trade pact with the European Union and granting far greater access to its tightly protected car market.

title: 30 Years After Ecclesia in Africa, Church’s Family of God Vision Remains “strikingly relevant”: SECAM President
desc: The vision of the Church as the “Family of God,” articulated 30 years ago in Ecclesia in Africa, remains “relevant” for the Church in Central Africa amid conflict, insecurity, and social fragmentation, the President of the Symposium of Episcopal Conferences of Africa and Madagascar (SECAM) has said.

title: Nandom Hospital to receive 3 dialysis machines
desc: The St. Theresa’s Hospital in Nandom in the Upper West Region is set to receive a major boost in specialised healthcare delivery following plans by a Non-Governmental Organisation (NGO) to donate three dialysis machines to the facility.

title: Dominic Michael McDermott, Ballyhillion, Malin Head, formerly of Manchester, UK
desc: The death has occurred of Dominic Michael McDermott surrounded by his family at Letterkenny University Hospital on 26th January 2026 and late of Ballyhillion, Malin Head F93 KF25, co-owner of Caffe Banba, Carndonagh and formerly of Manchester, UK.
